intelligence noun
(SECRET INFORMATION)
[ U, + sing/pl verb ] secret information about the governments of other countries, especially enemy governments, or a group of people who collect and deal with this information: the Central Intelligence Agency military intelligenceintelligence that They received intelligence (reports) that the factory was a target for the bombing.
